extension.summary: An extensible Interface for general access to anything you get from a desktop machine
extension.description: This plugin enables you to optimize the access to any media source using desktop-files and advanced dialog script/plugins (xidlg/xipy). It enables you to record any played media-source and includes many more nifty addons like e.g. webbrowser, pdf and document-viewer, emulation-frontend, kde/plasma widget, firefox-plugin, etc. Everything you miss from your desktop should be included here. Feel free to email me more whishes.
